Reviews.Title: “GREAT LOCATION”

Reviews.Content: breakfast location 70 near ubahn cheap markets shooping centers near hotelrooms clean pillows thin speak turkish english wonderfull tegel airport hotel taxi’s fee 30 euro 5 pax

Reviews.Title: “i would not recommand this hotel”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: pillow blood stain smokers floor am smoke told checkout 12pm sharp aclub gold ship allows late checkout refuse 15 minutes 12pm internet free slow 9 euro 1 hour bad internet service

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel - location...hmm”
Reviews.Author: misharmo
Reviews.Content: hotel spacious clean designed overlooked street noise breakfast bar prices werent bad hotel besides underground little bit dodgy dark wouldnt walk night decent restaurants lots cheap shops pepper spray
